payload.rawSql:
INSERT INTO comments (id, device_id, title, body, user_id)
VALUES (nextval('seq_comments'), ${payload.row.id}, ${payload.item.title:sqlstring}, ${payload.item.body:sqlstring}, ${__user.id})
DELETE FROM comments WHERE id=${payload.item.id}
select * from comments WHERE id IN (${payload.ids:csv});
select id, title from comments WHERE id IN (${payload.ids:csv});
insert into devices values (nextval('seq_devices'), '${payload.name}', '${payload.city}', '${payload.state}', '${payload.country}')
DELETE FROM devices WHERE id=${payload.id}

targets.rawSql:
select
*,
array_to_json(array(
	select id
	from comments comments
	where comments.device_id = devices.id
)) as comments,
array_to_json(array(
	select id
	from comments comments
	where comments.device_id = devices.id
)) as small_comments
from devices
order by id;

payload.rawSql:
INSERT INTO
  comments (id, device_id, title, body, user_id)
VALUES
  (
    nextval('seq_comments'),
    ${payload.row.id},
    ${payload.item.title:sqlstring},
    ${payload.item.body:sqlstring},
    ${payload.item.none:sqlstring},
    test
    ${__user.id}
  )
DELETE FROM comments WHERE id=${payload.item.id}
select * from comments WHERE id IN (${payload.ids:csv});
select id, title from comments WHERE id IN (${payload.ids:csv});
insert into devices values (nextval('seq_devices'), '${payload.name}', '${payload.city}', '${payload.state}', '${payload.country}')
DELETE FROM devices WHERE id=${payload.id}

UPDATE
  devices
SET
  name = ${payload.name:sqlstring}
  test = test
WHERE
  id = ${payload.id};

targets.rawSql:
select
*,
array_to_json(array(
	select id
	from comments comments
	where comments.device_id = devices.id
)) as comments,
array_to_json(array(
	select id
	from comments comments
	where comments.device_id = devices.id
)) as small_comments
from devices
order by id;
